DOC.brief_summary: The investigators are developing and then testing whether Mindfulness-Based Stress Reduction, a group-based instruction for increasing mindfulness, reduces anxiety and depressive symptoms and improves cognitive functioning in older adults.
DOC.brief_title: Mindfulness-based Stress Reduction and Cognitive Function in Stress and Aging
DOC.criteria: aged 65+ current depressive and/or anxiety symptoms current depressive and/or anxiety disorder able to participate in behavioral study unable to participate in study
